Service Details: Offers the community a full service recreational facility that includes a full size gymnasium, weight training room, aerobic room, circuit training room, 25 metre swimming pool, meeting rooms, banquet facility, and a boardroom
Cost: Please phone or visit our website for details on program and facility fees and passes
Address & Map: 1800 Parkinson WayKelowna, BC     V1Y 4P9View MapQuest Map
Accessibility: Fully Accessible ; Accessible by public transit, access friendly facility, wheel chair accessible, disabled parking, automatic doors, access friendly washrooms, hydraulic pool lift for main pool, ramp entry to small pool, access friendly fitness centre
